import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { ModeContext } from "./ModeContext"; function Footer() { const [show, setShow, language, setLanguage, mobile] = useContext(ModeContext); const sty = { textAlign: language.footer.textAlign, direction: language.footer.dir }; const sty2 = { height: mobile.footer }; return (


{/* Stack the columns on mobile by making one full-width and the other half-width */}
{language.contact.title}
  • Warehouse 1th Floor,
  • Street #24, Industrial area #4,
  • Sharjah, UAE
  • +971563201418
  • rukn.mangemeny@gmail.com
{language.service.title}
  • {language.service[1]}
  • {language.service[2]}
  • {language.service[3]}
  • {language.service[4]}
  • {language.service[5]}
  • {language.service[6]}
  • {language.service[7]}
  • {language.service[8]}
  • {language.service[9]}
{language.footer.title}
); } export default Footer;
